CustomField.formula:
IF( Initiated_Time_of_Day__c > 6 && Initiated_Time_of_Day__c <= 20, Entry_Time__c,
IF(Initiated_Time_of_Day_for_Exit__c>= 21 && Initiated_Time_of_Day_for_Exit__c<= 24, Entry_Time__c ,
IF(Initiated_Time_of_Day_for_Exit__c>=0 && Initiated_Time_of_Day_for_Exit__c<=5 , Entry_Time__c,
IF( Initiated_Time_of_Day__c >= 21 && Initiated_Time_of_Day__c <= 24, DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate+ 1))&' 6:00:00') ,
IF(Initiated_Time_of_Day__c >=0 && Initiated_Time_of_Day__c <=6 , DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))&' 6:00:00'), null )))))
CustomField.label: Entry Time Within Work Hours
